text: The Emgrand EC8 is a large Family car made by Emgrand a brand of Geely from 2010 to 2014. == History and Features == The Emgrand EC8 was launched at the Beijing Auto Show in 2010 formely it was the Emgrand EC825. its the first Large Family car from Geely the design resembles the Toyota Camry and the Cadillac CTS the car has 2.0 and 2.4 liter petrol engines and a 5-speed manual transmission and a 6-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The Emgrand EC8 was sold mainly in China but it was sold in other countries like Vietnam. == Discontinuation == The Emgrand EC8 was discontinued in 2014 due to the discontinuation of the Emgrand brand and was replaced by the Geely Borui. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Emgrand EC8
